FuncDef:
The aging-time command configures the IFIT aging time.
The undo aging-time command restores the default IFIT aging time. The aging-time command configures the IFIT aging time. The undo aging-time command restores the default IFIT aging time. By default, the IFIT aging time is 120 seconds. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the aging time of the IFIT flow table.
The value is an integer in the range from 10 to 3600. The default value is 120.

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to adjust the IFIT aging time based on network requirements. If no packet statistics are collected in a flow table until the aging time expires, IFIT deletes the flow table.
